Template Function rain_mue_dm_relation_sb¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
float_t rain_mue_dm_relation_sb(const float_t &D_m, const float_t &cmu0, const float_t &cmu1, const float_t &cmu2, const float_t &cmu3, const float_t &cmu4)¶

Calculate the shape parameter as in Seifert & Beheng (2008), Eq. 20.

Return

Parameters

  • D_m: Volume diameter

  • cmu0: Parametrization value

  • cmu1: Parametrization value

  • cmu2: Parametrization value

  • cmu3: Parametrization value

  • cmu4: Parametrization value
